title: FADE TO BLONDE
description: René Hire is the exotic blonde nineteen year old beauty who pledges complete sexual obedience to her womanizer stepfather Nick Johnson in return for help to pursue her acting career. René meets his demands as his actress in sexual scenes as a stripper, old Western piano playing prostitute and then sexy housemaid, and René acted her beautiful ass off for him but wasn’t ready for what happened to her each time before her director of perversion could yell out cut, fade to blonde. René became someone else each time. A wild group sex scene made it clear she would never be the same again. But she is a born actress with naked ambition.
author: Alvin Slater
